text: The 2010 European Badminton Championships were the 22nd tournament of the European Badminton Championships. They were held in Manchester, England, from April 14 to April 18, 2010, and they were organised by the Badminton Europe and the Badminton England. Venue of this event was the Manchester Evening News Arena. ==Medalists== {| |- |rowspan=2|Men's singles |rowspan=2| Peter Gade |rowspan=2| Jan Ø. Jørgensen | Marc Zwiebler |- | Rajiv Ouseph |- |rowspan=2|Women's singles |rowspan=2| Tine Rasmussen |rowspan=2| Juliane Schenk | Pi Hongyan |- | Ella Diehl |- |rowspan=2|Men's doubles |rowspan=2| Lars Paaske Jonas Rasmussen |rowspan=2| Mathias Boe Carsten Mogensen | Kasper Faust Henriksen Anders Kristiansen |- | Michael Fuchs Ingo Kindervater |- |rowspan=2|Women's doubles |rowspan=2| Valeria Sorokina Nina Vislova |rowspan=2| Petya Nedelcheva Anastasia Russkikh | Mariana Agathangelou Heather Olver |- | Line Damkjær Kruse Mie Schøtt-Kristensen |- |rowspan=2|Mixed doubles |rowspan=2| Thomas Laybourn Kamilla Rytter Juhl |rowspan=2| Robert Mateusiak Nadieżda Kostiuczyk | Wouter Claes Nathalie Descamps |- | Nathan Robertson Jenny Wallwork |} ==Results== ===Men's singles=== ===Women's singles=== ===Men's doubles=== ===Women's doubles=== ===Mixed doubles=== * Carsten Mogensen was given a red card after the game for kicking his racquet into the crowd. ==Medal count== {| class=wikitable style="font-size:95%; text-align: center" !Pos !Country !Gold !Silver !Bronze !Total |- |1||style="text- align:left"| ||4||2||2||8 |- |2||style="text-align:left"| ||1||1||1||3 |- |3||style="text-align:left"| ||0||1||2||3 |- |rowspan=2 |4||style="text- align:left"| ||0||1||0||1 |- |style=text-align:left| ||0||1||0||1 |- |6||style="text-align:left"| ||0||0||3||3 |- |rowspan=2 |7||style="text- align:left"| ||0||0||1||1 |- |style="text-align:left"| ||0||0||1||1 |} ==External links== *2010 European Championships *European Championships 2010 at tournamentsoftware.com Category:European Badminton Championships European Badminton Championships European Badminton Championships Category:Badminton tournaments in England Category:2010s in Manchester Category:International sports competitions in Manchester
